---
title: "protocol_25"
---

Protocol_25.m  - short protocol for testing individual flies.
Includes:
- off background interval - pattern 47
- 60 deg gratings - 2 speeds
- flicker - 1 speed
20s interval
30s trial duration - 2x15s trials

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 4 |
| Patterns Used | 4 |
| t_acclim_start | 300s |
| t_acclim_end | 30s |
| t_interval | 20s |
| t_flash | 5s |
| t_pause | 0.01 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 27](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_27.qmd) | 64 | 15s | 60 deg gratings - 4Hz - 2 px step pattern |
| 2 | [Pattern 27](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_27.qmd) | 127 | 15s | 60 deg gratings - 8Hz - 2px step pattern |
| 3 | [Pattern 10](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_10.qmd) | 8 | 15s | Flicker - 4Hz |
| 4 | [Pattern 10](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_10.qmd) | 16 | 15s | Flicker - 8Hz |
